[requires]
zlib/1.2.12
opengl/system
sfml/2.5.1
gtest/1.11.0
pybind11/2.6.1
recastnavigation/cci.20200511
yaml-cpp/0.7.0
imgui/1.84.2
doxygen/1.9.2
boost/1.78.0

[options]
boost:shared=False
sfml:graphics=True
sfml:window=True
sfml:audio=False
sfml:network=False

[generators]
cmake
cmake_find_package
cmake_paths

[imports]
lib, *.dylib* -> ./bin
